page.title: 12AN OLD AGE PENSIONER
page.content: One 62 year old pensioner who has lived in{Southill}since childhood went to{Southill Lower School.}In that school he had the cane, he left the school when he was 14.When he was 15 he managed to get a job as a gardener for the{Queen Mother's Brother.}Then in 1939 war broke out between Britain and Germany.In 1940 he joined army and became a{bomb disposal expert.}He came out of the army in 1946 and he went back to farming.As far as he knows there are no ghosts in Southill. He thinks modern hairstyles and modern music are disagreeable to him.He is still employed in farming today and hopes to continue for many years.
